mapper.insert: /*FiCbPayChannelCostMapper.insert*/ INSERT INTO FI_CBPAY_CHANNEL_COST ( BATCH_NO, MEMBER_NO, CHANNEL_ID, CHANNEL_FEE, CURRENCY, REMARKS, CREATE_AT, UPDATE_AT, UPDATE_BY, CREATE_BY )VALUES ( #{batchNo}, #{memberNo}, #{channelId}, #{channelFee}, #{currency}, #{remarks}, NOW(), NOW(), #{updateBy}, #{createBy} )
